project.name: jboss-javaee6-webapp
project.description: The example demonstrates Weld Java EE 6 application. It will create the jboss-javaee6-webapp project in your workspace based on the org.jboss.weld.archetypes:jboss-javaee6-webapp:1.0.1.Beta2 archetype.

fix.property: This project example requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 6

project.importTypeDescription: The project example requires the m2eclipse-core, m2eclipse-wtp and JBoss Maven Project Examples feature.

project.name: helloworld
project.description: This example demonstrates the use of CDI 1.0 and Servlet 3 in JBoss Application Server 7.1. The example can be deployed using Maven from the command line or from Eclipse using JBoss Tools.
project.importTypeDescription: The project example requires the m2eclipse, m2eclipse-wtp and JBoss Maven Project Examples feature.

project.name:
helloworld-os
Weld archetypes jboss-javaee6-webapp jboss-javaee6-webapp Weld Java EE 6 example
The example demonstrates Weld Java EE 6 application. It will create the jboss-javaee6-webapp project in your workspace based on the org.jboss.weld.archetypes:jboss-javaee6-webapp:1.0.1.Beta2 archetype.

JBoss Quickstarts helloworld 1 jboss-as-helloworld Helloworld
This example demonstrates the use of CDI 1.0 and Servlet 3 in JBoss Application Server 7.1. The example can be deployed using Maven from the command line or from Eclipse using JBoss Tools.
8192 http://anonsvn.jboss.org/repos/jbosstools/workspace/snjeza/jbossas7-examples/helloworld.zip
org.jboss.ide.eclipse.as.runtime.71 works with JBoss 7.1 org.jboss.tools.runtime.core.as.710

maven The project example requires the m2eclipse, m2eclipse-wtp and JBoss Mav
